name: nomdeplume
0:
”Alexa, open nom de plume”
”Alexa, start nom de plume”
”Alexa, launch nom de plume”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nom de plume
des:
The Nom De Plume selects both a first and last name. The Nom De Plume is a name generator that helps you select a new name. There are many reasons to use Nom De Plume, such as naming characters in a story, adopting a pen name, use in online forums, protection from identity theft, testing online data, looking for a name change, inspiration for naming a baby, or looking for a stage name.
It spells out the names after reading them. 
It also offers sample addresses and postal codes.
The names and addresses are from a large and diverse data base. Most of the data is written in the English alphabet but occasionally information appears in the Arabic alphabet and is not read by Alexa. However the script is visible on screened devices such as Echo Show. 



This skill was built with love by VoiceApps.com. Visit us to create your own skill in minutes!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
